name: UITimingCurveProvider
desc: An interface for providing the timing information needed to perform animations.

items.name: var timingCurveType: UITimingCurveType
items.desc: The type of timing information to use.

items.desc: The cubic timing parameters to use.

items.name: var springTimingParameters: UISpringTimingParameters?
items.desc: The spring-based timing parameters to use.

items.name: enum UITimingCurveType
items.desc: Constants indicating the type of timing information to use.
